biography_text: SPANBERGER, Abigail, a Representative from Virginia; born in Red Bank, Monmouth County, N.J., August 7, 1979; graduated from J.R. Tucker High School, Henrico, Va.; United States Capitol Page School, 1995; B.A., University of Virginia, Charlottesville, Va., 2001; M.B.A., Purdue University; teacher; postal inspector, United States Postal Service; agent, Central Intelligence Agency, 2006-2014; consultant; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
